scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development REACT_APP_API_URL=https://recovery-office-backend-production.up.railway.app/api REACT_APP_ENVIRONMENT=development DISABLE_ESLINT_PLUGIN=true CI=false react-scripts start
scripts.start:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development REACT_APP_API_URL=https://recovery-office-backend-production.up.railway.app/api REACT_APP_ENVIRONMENT=development REACT_APP_DEBUG=true DISABLE_ESLINT_PLUGIN=true CI=false react-scripts start
scripts.start:clean: npm run clean && npm run start:dev
scripts.start:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=development REACT_APP_API_URL=https://recovery-office-backend-production.up.railway.app/api REACT_APP_ENVIRONMENT=development REACT_APP_DEBUG=true DISABLE_ESLINT_PLUGIN=true CI=false FAST_REFRESH=true react-scripts start
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules/.cache && rimraf build && npm cache clean --force
scripts.clean:all: rimraf node_modules/.cache && rimraf build && rimraf node_modules && npm cache clean --force && npm install
scripts.build: cross-env DISABLE_ESLINT_PLUGIN=true CI=false TSC_COMPILE_ON_ERROR=true react-scripts build
scripts.build:debug: cross-env GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=true NODE_ENV=development DISABLE_ESLINT_PLUGIN=true CI=false TSC_COMPILE_ON_ERROR=true react-scripts build
scripts.build:quick: cross-env DISABLE_ESLINT_PLUGIN=true CI=false TSC_COMPILE_ON_ERROR=true SKIP_TYPESCRIPT_CHECK=true react-scripts build
scripts.test:syntax: npm run type-check && npm run build:debug
